column5: Hi my name Brian Burns. I'm from Titusville Pa. I haven't been to Canada fishing for 8 years. I'm taking my boy up and a couple of other guys to Lake sasseginaga June 15th to 22nd. Me and my brother went to other lakes for about 8 years straight but had to start all our kids weddings and that set us back but we are ready to start again. Just wondering how much fishing permits for US guys and is there any other permits for that area we have to pay for. Been to that lake once in mid July has anybody fish that lake in mid June we are staying at the outpost. Thanks for any help.
This should give you all the info you need. http://www.worldwidefishing.com/quebec/b3907/index.html
Not familiar with the Quebec regs.  There should be some info on www.kipawa.net.

Hi Brian, welcome aboard, I'm not familiar with that lake, sorry, But here is a link to the Quebec fishing regulations  (April 1, 2012- March 31, 2014)  http://http://www.mrn.gouv.qc.ca/english/publications/online/wildlife/fishing-regulations/index.asp  Good luck on your trip.
Never been to Quebec, but allow me to say "welcome" to a fellow Pennsylvanian.
FishLogic is right...hit kipawa.net and you'll have access to more info about that lake, timing, best tactics, locations, regs, costs, etc. than you can process.  Good luck.

thanks everybody you don't know how hard lt was reading all the posts about canada the last 8 years and not beening able to go. But 3 weddings hurt the old bank account. the trouble of knowing we are going in June is the wait.

Rich I live in Titusville but was born in Roaring springs. My family move out of the area when i was 2 months old. So I don't know that area to well except Johnstown my boy wrestle JO states down there 5 years.
